alfredsnippet.snippet:
"This 'edge' of time at the purported Big Bang is of similar naïveté to concepts of a perilous Earth's 'edge' found in some fanciful medieval paintings."

- Alexander F. Mayer, On the Geometry of Time in Physics and Cosmology and the fall of the canonical cosmological model
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Edge of Time in the Big Bang
